resources.string: Add a driver with an Uber account
"You agree and acknowledge that you have consent to share the personal data of the person that you're inviting to join your fleet. Invitation restrictions apply."
"We'll send the driver a notification requesting consent to join the organisation."
"It will take a couple of minutes to appear, and we'll send the driver a notification requesting consent to join the organisation."
This driver has been added successfully.
It looks like you are trying to log in from a browser. Please review this login.
Something went wrong. Please log in again.
Something went wrong. Please log in again.
Centre QR code and hold still
Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later.
Would you like to report this problem?
Bug reporter needs \\’Draw over other apps\\’ permission to display floating button. Go to Settings to grant the permission?
Your issue could not be submitted as this time. Please try submitting again after some time
To find the right owner, select a specific component on the screen
Get more rewards when you order food for business, such as extra Uber reward points that can be used personally.
Use your Amex Corporate Card and get more rewards
This activation link has already been used. Please contact your admin if you believe this is in error.
This activation link is invalid. Please ask your admin to resend the invitation.
Make Uber Cash for personal use when you travel with Uber or order with Uber Eats for business.
Use your Amex Corporate Green, Gold or Platinum Card, make Uber Cash
Link your account to a business and start expensing eligible trips
Set rules for travel expensing and invite others to charge eligible trips
Get receipts emailed to a work inbox, keep work trips separate and more
Send receipts to your business email, get travel reports, set up a business payment method and more.
Please try to scan your ID again. The photo should be bright and clear, and make sure all corners of your document are within the frame.

"Your card has not been verified yet. To complete your order, we need to verify it.
You can always verify it later and choose a different payment method to use."
The app will restart after you change the organisation.
High-priority channel for delivering fleet owner interested notifications
Normal-priority channel for delivering fleet owner interested notifications
By sending this photo, I certify that it does not contain inappropriate content in violation of the community guidelines or sensitive personal data.
Please check your connection and try again.
Please click the refresh button to reload.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Your contacts will be periodically synced and stored to our servers. You can delete contacts in Settings. [Learn more]
"Sorry, we couldn't complete your request. Please try again later or try again with a digital payment."
"So we know it's you, please verify your CPF number."
"You've reached the maximum number of attempts to validate your CPF. Please try again later."
"When your team joins, %s will be added as a trip profile and they'll be able to charge trips to your business account."
By allowing access to Uber Eats, you agree to the {Uber Eats} Terms of Service and Conditions.
Would you also like to allow your team to use Uber Eats?
"We weren't able to set up your account. Please try again later."
"Now let your teammates join this business account. Send an invitation link and they'll be able to connect using their work email."
I’ve just created a shared Uber account for our team so we can share a payment method for Uber trips for work. You can join the account using this link: %s
I’ve just created a shared Uber account for our team so we can share a payment method for Uber trips for work. You can join the account using this link: %s
Unlock trip and meal rewards with Uber for Business
Enjoy the benefits of Uber, reimagined for business. Get started to see if your organisation offers travel and/or meal benefits through Uber for Business or create a new account.

Designed for the business traveller, Uber Business Comfort includes features built to help minimise waiting times and maximise comfort, such as priority pick-up, top-rated drivers, extra legroom and more. Features, waiting times and availability may vary by location and client.
It is simple to switch between business and personal profiles, ensuring that your expenses are properly split and that the correct payment method is used.
Receive receipts and travel reports in your inbox
Get receipts sent to your work email address
Could not join the organisation associated with your work email address. Please try again later.
Sort your trips for easier expensing
Just choose personal or business by tapping the payment method when you request a trip.
"Please verify your card details and try again."
"There's an issue with the card details you entered."

"You're all set to receive special offers, personalised recommendations and essential product updates for all Uber services. This may include related services like Rides, Eats, Grocery, Scooters/Bikes and more.
To manage your communication or marketing preferences, just go to:"
"Agree to receive email & SMS notifications about promotions, special offers and product updates offered by Uber. You can opt out at any time from the Settings - Privacy Centre of your app."
%1$s driver online hours report is ready
Toggles driver sorting by online hours
%s has invited you to join their meal programme. Link your account and start ordering.

By adding, you acknowledge and agree that Uber can share information on how this voucher is used with the company issuing this voucher to you. Limited availability. No cash value. Uber Voucher does not apply to tips on Eats. Offer is non-transferrable, and subject to change or cancellation. Issues involving redemption and/or use of the voucher from Uber should be directed to the company issuing this voucher to you.
"This voucher can't be used for pick-up orders. Choose delivery to use this voucher."
This voucher cannot be used at the selected time.
This voucher cannot be used on alcoholic items.
"We do this occasionally to protect your account. To continue, you'll answer a few questions about yourself. We don't use your info for any purpose other than to verify your identity."

"The security of your account is important to us, so we want to make sure you're the only person who has access. To confirm your identity, we'll review the personal details you provide. We may require additional documentation to validate these details, such as a government-issued ID.
We don't use your info for any purpose other than to confirm it's really you, and to keep your account safe."

"You'll need one of the following original government-issued documents listed below.
National ID
Passport
Driving licence"
Please enter the 4-digit code sent to you by email.
This email address is already linked with another account. Enter a different email address to create a new account
Enter the 4-digit verification code sent to your phone
Please try again to keep things moving.
A verification email will be sent to this email address.
Please confirm that the email address below is associated with your %s account.
Start receiving business trip receipts in %s after you verify your email address.

By linking to the %s account, I agree that Uber may share information with the Company, or other third parties at the Company’s direction, relating to trips and meals charged to my business profile, including in the event of safety-related incidents.

By clicking \"Accept\", you agree to {Uber’s Terms} and Conditions and {Privacy Policy} and that Uber may share details of your trips and meals charged to your business profile with this organisation and other third parties at the organisation’s direction, including in the event of safety-related incidents.
%s is inviting you to join their Uber for Business account. Accept the invite to unlock easier expensing, see specific meals and trips programmes and other exciting perks.
Great news! %s offers programmes through Uber for Business
"We'll automatically upload receipts to your expensing software after each business trip."
After updating your work email address, you will need to verify it to enable your expenses integration.
Are you sure you want to remove this person? They will no longer be able to charge trips to your payment method.
When you take a trip using this profile, these preferences will be selected by default.
After updating your work email address, you will need to verify it to enable your expenses integration.
Changing your email address here will update your business profile work email address.
This device does not have a fingerprint sensor
Too many attempts. Please try again later.
Make up to %s for each new partner you invite. {Terms} apply
New partners can make up to %1$s* extra after completing their first %2$d trips. {Terms} apply
Invite someone you know to join and make money on their own schedule. {Terms} apply
Sign up and make an extra %1$s after completing your first %2$d trips. Get the details here: %3$s
Hi there, Uber’s looking for new partners. Sign up and learn more here: %s
Access weekly payments, incentives and fees, so you and your drivers get your money on time, every time.
Add anyone to your fleet, any time, anywhere.
Know the location of your drivers and stay updated with your fleet.
We may use your gender information for safety features, personalisation of ads and marketing and user experience research. Riders will never see your gender information.
We get your gender from your driving licence. If your licence doesn’t include gender, we try to determine your gender from other information on your licence.
Choose the gender that best represents how you identify, even if it differs from what’s on your driving licence or other government-issued ID
Oops! Looks as if something went wrong.
Something went wrong, please try again.
No PIN, pattern or password set.
This device does not support PIN, pattern or password.
Get a safe, reliable trip in minutes
Your gift card code has been redeemed successfully and can be used towards your next trip or order
Welcome back, please sign in to continue
Welcome back, we recognise this account. Please sign in to continue.
Enter your email address to recover your account
Are you sure you want to end the chat? Your conversation will be saved in the support inbox.
Please check your network connection and try again
Error updating your appointment. Please try again soon
Error scheduling your appointment. Please try again soon
"We couldn't find anything matching your search. Try searching other keywords."
Please check your network connection and try again
"For faster support, please tell us what kind of issue you're calling about."
"If you can't see the email, check your spam folder or resend the email. If you are still having trouble, contact support."
A %1$d-digit code has been sent to %2$s
For your security, please enter your old password.
"This shouldn't take much longer. In the meantime, you can start planning your first trip and, once we verify your ID, you'll be able to request a trip."
Make sure photo isn’t blurry. Wipe your lens if it’s not clear.
Add photo of back of ID
Add photo of front of ID
Make sure all text is clear and legible
Turn over your ID to take a photo and complete the verification process.
Hang in there! Our reviewers are verifying your document. This could take up to two minutes.
"There's a problem with our connection to the verification centre. Please try again later."
Check your email at %s to verify your email address and access your rewards.
A profile already matches that email address. Restart your app to use your profile.
We’re still connecting you to your company account. If you need a trip now, switch to personal.
Your admin flagged one or more trips for review. Review your trip to take your business trip, or switch to personal.
There’s a problem with your business account. Please contact your account admin for more info.
Unless you set up a payment method, you won’t be able to request a trip.
You must choose a payment method to take a business trip.
%s has invited you to join their travel programme. Link your account and start riding.
Travel for business and keep your work and personal trips separate.
Get receipts to your work email
This profile cannot be restored once it has been deleted.
This invitation is not valid for this profile. Please ask your admin to resend your invitation.
"Thank you. We'll notify you when your invitees sign up to drive."
The status of your invitees will be here once people have signed up to drive with your code or link

"You might have disabled the browser on your phone. Please enable your browser and click on this link again.
Or you can open your browser and go to %1$s\""
"Choose which of your loyalty points you'd like to redeem for Uber Cash."
Something went wrong but we’re looking into it.
Switch to clock mode for the time input.
Switch to text input mode for the time input.

"We are unable to open the message app.
Please text \"%1$s\" to %2$s to receive a verification code and other informational messages about your Uber account"
Once you’re 12, you can request trips with the permission of a parent or guardian. Thanks for your interest in Uber
You must be 12 or older to request trips with Uber
Welcome! Please enter your phone number to continue
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
"A trip purpose is required to request a trip on %s's profile."
Your company will cover up to %s per month. This trip will exceed that limit and the remainder will be charged to your secondary payment method.
"You're currently viewing your Uber Money account on multiple devices. To continue, you'll need to sign out on one of the devices."
We need some permissions to run this app. Please grant them in App settings.
This page needs to be updated.
"There's a problem with our connection to the verification centre. Please try again later."
Before we start, please verify your identity with your social security number.
You are not authorised to delete this vehicle.

By proceeding, I agree that Uber or its representatives may contact me by email, phone or SMS (including by automated means) at the email address or number I provide, including for marketing purposes. I have read and understand the %1$s and %2$s.
As part of a new EU regulation to keep your payments safe, you’ll need to sign up for an account online. Click on the link below to be taken to our online sign-up.
"Job dispatch has stopped as this device is in an unsupported area. Please move this device back to a supported location and click '%1$s' button to restart job dispatch."
Your password should have %1$d characters or more with at least one digit and one alphabetical character.
Passwords must have at least %1$d characters
Please select your preferred payment method
Please enter a valid expiry date
Please enter a valid credit card number
You should be able to find this on the front of your card, above your name and the expiry date.
A three-digit code on your credit card which you can find on the back of your card.
First six digits of card number
Please ensure the card number is visible
An unknown error occurred, please try again soon.
We’re having trouble reaching the network. Please check your connection or try again in a few minutes.
There are currently some issues with this payment method. Please choose another payment method.
"Please re-enter the security code of one of your cards to confirm it's an authorised use of your account."
If you cancel now, you’ll lose your progress. Visit the Payment menu in the app when you’re ready to start again.
Image for confirmation to place authorisations

An authorisation hold is a temporary charge that is used to make sure that your payment method works correctly. It shows as a pending charge in your bank app or website and will be deleted as soon as your card is verified or you cancel the verification.
"%d temporary authorisation charges will be sent to your credit card. Your card won't actually be charged."
"Sign in to your bank's app or website to find the %1$d authorisation charges %2$s%3$d-%4$d. {more_info}"
Enter the exact amounts of the %d authorisations to continue using it with Uber.
"%1$d amounts of %2$s%3$d–%4$s%5$d will be sent to your card. Your card won't actually be charged."

"Are you sure you want to exit card verification? You will need to verify pp_info before you can use this card with Uber.
You can always verify it later and choose a different payment method to use."

"You'll see %1$d temporary authorisation charges from uber_auth_token between %2$s%3$d and %4$s%5$d. These charges should show up immediately, but in some cases may take up to 24 hours to appear on your credit card statement."
Image for more info about authorisations
"When you're ready, we will send %1$d authorisations to your pp_info. These amounts will only be valid for %2$d hours."
"We were unable to send authorisations to your bank. Please try again in a few minutes"
"We're experiencing technical difficulties. You can try again or cancel the verification and switch your payment method."

"Your card is yet not verified. To complete your order, we need to verify it.
You can always verify it later and choose a different payment method to use."
"Find the %1$d Uber authorisation holds in your banking app, website or SMS notifications. Enter the exact amounts below. Your card has not actually been charged."

"You'll see %1$d temporary authorisation holds from \"Uber Auth\" between %2$s and %3$s. These charges should show up immediately, but in some cases may take up to 24 hours to appear on your card statement."
The authorisation holds were sent on %1$s at %2$s.
Log in to your pp_info, find the authorisations and enter the exact amounts below. (Amounts should be between %1$s%2$d–%3$d)
Success. You can change preferences at any time.

"Allow Uber to send transactional & marketing push notifications to get real-time updates on your driver's location so that you never miss your pick-up. You will also receive critical safety information and special promotional offers. You can update your preferences at any time in the Settings menu."

Allow Uber to send transactional & marketing push notifications to get real-time updates on your trip status and driver location. You will also receive critical safety information and special promotional offers. You can update your preferences at any time in the Settings menu.
Allow transactional & marketing push notifications to stop missing out on real-time trip updates, new features, (cost-saving) deals and more. You can always opt out at any time in Settings.
"Allow transactional & marketing push notifications, and we'll buzz you when your driver is nearby. You can opt out at any time in Settings."
"• Place the document in the frame • Make sure all text is clear and legible • Avoid glare"
"In order to complete photo upload, please enable gallery access from your settings by tapping on Permissions, then turning on storage access"
By tapping SAVE, you agree that Uber or a trusted vendor can collect and process your photos with technology that allows us to verify your identity.
By continuing, you agree to the permissions used by this app and the Uber Privacy Statement.
Now when you request trips, switch to %s to put your new features to work.
Profile has been disabled. Please contact your admin
Charge eligible trips to the group
Get receipts to your work email
%1$d months free, then %2$d%% off for %3$d months
There’s a problem with your business account. Please contact your account admin for more info.
To finish setting up your business account, please verify your email address.
Your request didn’t go through. Check your Internet connection and try again.
Your changes weren’t saved. Please try again later. If the error persists, please contact support.
Sorry, this loyalty programme isn’t available to you currently. To see which programmes you can link to, head to Settings in the Uber app.
Find out more about programme details

By adding, you acknowledge and agree that Uber can share information on how this voucher is used with the company issuing this voucher to you. Limited availability. No cash value. Uber Voucher does not apply to tips. Offer is non-transferrable, and subject to change or cancellation. Issues involving redemption and/or use of the Uber Voucher should be directed to the company issuing this voucher to you.

Please wait while we share your screen with support
Your agent cannot view your screen. Tap on ‘start share’ to share your screen.
A business profile needs a bank card or credit card set up as the secondary payment method.
Unfortunately, 2-step verification is unavailable at the moment
Please try again with the same payment method or go back to change your payment method.
Create an Uber account to get the candidate started
"Before we start, we’ve just sent a 4-digit code to your phone. Please enter it below."
Unfortunately, the code you entered does not match our files. Please try again later.
Check your mobile network or Wi-Fi settings.
Click here to connect using social media
Welcome back. Sign in with your social account to continue
The social security number you entered does not match the one we have on file.
"You've reached the maximum attempts to validate your social security number. Please try again later."
Log in as a different user
Are you sure you want to start again?
"It's taking a little longer than expected to verify your identity. This usually takes a few minutes, but may take up to 48 hours. If it takes any longer, please contact support for help."
"We're experiencing technical difficulties and could not complete your request. Please try again in a few minutes."
We encourage you to read our updated terms in full
By checking the box, I confirm that I have reviewed and agree to the Terms of Use and acknowledge the Privacy Notice.

No transactions posted for this day
No transactions posted for this week

This page will open in system browser
Now you’ll receive payments automatically to this bank account.
Align your face and neck within the white lines
Relax and hold your phone steady to avoid blurring
Fit your face inside the guide
Hold the camera at eye level and align your face in the white lines
Look into the camera, smile and hold your phone steady
How to take a photo with your face covering or mask on:
Relax and hold your phone steady to avoid blurring
Hold the camera at eye level and align your face in the white lines
Place your face covering or mask over your nose and mouth
Take a photo with your face covering or mask on
Please keep your face inside the frame.
To find friends faster, turn on contact permissions in your app settings.
Search or enter a name, number or email address
Search or enter a name or email address
Share your trip status with family and friends with a single tap
Enter a valid date of birth (it needs to be for someone over %1$d years old)
Invalid date of birth. Enter your date of birth as DD/MM/YYYY.

By taking a photo, you agree that it will be a live photo of yourself, not a photo of an existing photo. As a reminder, Uber will never ask you for your password, authentication codes or to change your bank account.
We need a photo of your whole face to verify your account.
There was a network error. Please check your Internet connection and take another photo.
In order to continue, please verify your identity with a digital payment method. This is only for verification purposes – your card will not be charged.
Failed to connect your account. Please try again

Uber B.V. uses your data to provide and improve its services. You have the right to access and correct your data, delete your account and opt out of marketing communications. You may exercise your rights during sign-up or afterwards by contacting our %1$s, or by contacting Uber B.V. by post using the following address: Mr. Treublaan 7, 1097 DP, Amsterdam, Netherlands.
"If you don't have one, please add another photo ID or a credit card."
You can change it later in Settings.
"By tapping the arrow below, you agree to Uber's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy"
Tick the box to indicate you are at least 18 years of age, agree to the %1$s and acknowledge the %2$s.
Add payment method or redeem gift card

This voucher is no longer valid because it was cancelled by the issuing party.
The pick-up or drop-off location you’ve selected is out of range for this voucher. Choose a trip compatible with this voucher.

Claim your voucher and get ready to travel.

By accepting, you acknowledge and agree that Uber can share information on trips taken with this voucher with the company issuing this voucher to you. Limited availability. No cash value. Voucher from Uber does not apply to tips. Offer is non-transferrable, and subject to change or cancellation. Issues involving redemption and/or use of the voucher from Uber should be directed to the company issuing this voucher to you.
Organisations can send you vouchers to pay for trips or meals.
